JobTitle: Lead Product Manager - Carrier Experience - Uber Freight
JobFullDesc: About the RoleUber Freight connects shippers with truckers, much like how Uber connects riders and drivers. We are a team of sharp, entrepreneurial individuals who are redefining the movement of things around the world. On the Uber Freight team, we fiercely believe that our dedication to transportation technologies will bring more harmonious, highly efficient, and increasingly safer transportation logistics to our roads. Uber Freight is looking for a Lead Product Manager to head the Carrier Experience team that's responsible for the growth and success of our carrier base (fleets of truck drivers). Truck drivers are the most common job in over 30 states and are the supply in our two-sided marketplace. Your scope will consist of leading a team of 3-4 PMs through new product development for carriers: aligning product vision with business objectives, translating user insights into feature ideation, and prioritizing and executing a roadmap. Specifically, your team's scope will focus on creating delightful user experiences for carriers and truck drivers across fleets large and small. Your team will cover a broad range of challenging problems including helping carriers improve their performance with Uber Freight, improving the user experience for large fleets (no matter what technology they have in place), and solving real-time on-trip issues that create friction in our transportation economy. What You'll DoWork with product leadership to define Carrier Experience product strategy and roadmapManage, coach, and mentor a growing team of Product Managers responsible for the supply side of our businessLead and collaborate with the broader technology team, including Engineering, Data Science, Design, UX Research, Sales, Business Development, Operations, Product Operations, and Marketing to bring your ideas to lifeDevelop objectives and key results (OKRs) to build short, medium, and long-term product roadmaps that take products from conception through launch and growthBuild and launch industry-changing products from scratch and by building upon existing technologies within the Uber Freight product suiteRepresent Uber in meetings with leadership and events to evangelize Uber Freight's products and capabilitiesBasic Qualifications5+ years experience in product management, 1+ years as a people managerExperience building 0 to 1 products, or scaling existing products. (B2B / B2C)Experience working alongside design teams / UX exposure along with cross-functional counterparts
